text: Drunk with Love (Persian: Masty eshq) is a 1951 Iranian drama film directed by Esmail Kushan.Issari p.137 ==Cast== * Alexander Bijanian * Hossein Daneshavar * Ma'soomeh Khakyar * Mehdi Maysaghieh * Habibollah Morad * Bahram Siar == References == == Bibliography == * Mohammad Ali Issari. Cinema in Iran, 1900-1979. Scarecrow Press, 1989. == External links == * Category:1951 films Category:Iranian films Category:Persian-language films Category:Films directed by Esmail Kushan
title: Drunk with Love
